price: (Фараон) Айтты: “Эгер сен чынчылдардан болсоң (жана Аллахтан) мужиза-далил алып келсең, аны көрсөтчү.
arabic: قَالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئۡتَ بِـَٔايَةٖ فَأۡتِ بِهَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: qāla in kunta ji'ta biāyatin fati bihā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
